DOC.brief_summary: Sixty patient randomize three group receive Kinesio taping , placebo Kinesio taping ( medical adhesive tape ) control group . The group Kinesio tap receive correct application method describe . The placebo group receive medical adhesive tape . The control group receive form intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Is Kinesio Taping More Effective Than Medical Adhesive Tape Patients With Chronic Non-specific Low Back Pain ?
DOC.detailed_description: The group Kinesio tap receive correct application method describe tension paper ( 10-15 % ) . The placebo group receive medical adhesive tape . The control group receive form intervention .
DOC.criteria: Patients nonspecific low back pain longer 3 month Seeking care low back pain Contra indication bandage Serious sinal pathology ( e.g . tumor , fracture inflammatory disease ) Nerve roto compromise Pregnancy
